title: 95/6/EC: Commission Decision of 13 January 1995 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Germany within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 January 1995 amending the boundaries of the less-favoured areas in Germany within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the German text is authentic) (95/6/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community list of less-favoured areas in Germany given in the Annex to Directive 92/92/EEC is hereby supplemented by the list given in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 January 1995.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
